recipe.title: Fig Salad with Goat's Milk Yogurt and Pepper Cress
ingredients: 1/2 cup soft fresh goat cheese, crumbled
24 ripe black Mission figs, halved lengthwise
2 bunches pepper cress or watercress, thick stems trimmed (about 4 cups)
instructions: Whisk together first 5 ingredients in medium bowl. Season with salt and reserve. Sprinkle figs with fleur de sel; set in center of plate. Drizzle dressing on figs; scatter pepper cress and mint over. Season with olive oil and Indonesian pepper.
